author: cutting
msg: Always call done() on tasks, setting final progress to 1.0.  Also permit RecordWriter.close() to emit progress reports to avoid task timeouts when closing is lengthy.

author: cutting
msg: Change so that call timeout is based on time since last i/o rather

author: colm
msg: Update the transformations to reflect the new graceful-stop argument.
